title: Maharashtra govt gives nod to 4 mega semiconductor, EV projects; Rs 1.17L cr investment proposed
description: The Maharashtra government has approved four high-tech mega projects with a total investment of Rs 1.17 lakh crore, creating 29,000 jobs in Marathwada, Vidarbha, Pune, and Panvel. These projects include semiconductor and electric vehicle manufacturing, boosting local supply chains and technical innovation.
